title: Custom Image Loader
description: Learn how to use a Custom Image Loader for Nextjs.

body.raw:
## Overview UploadShad renders Images using the [Nextjs Image component](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/components/image), which allows you to use a Custom Loader. There are many ways to configure the Nextjs Image Loader, so use what's best for you. Learn more about [Nextjs Image Loader](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/components/image#loaderfile). ## ImageCard Component The direct code showing how UploadShad displays image previews
```tsx ```
## Usage How to directly provide your Custom Image Loader to UploadShad.
```tsx import { YourCustomLoader } from "path-to-loader"; ; ```
### Thats it! You have successfully used your Custom Loader. ðŸŽ‰
Learn more about [Integrating with Shadcn Form](/integrations/shadcn-form) Learn more about [Integrating with React Hook Form](/integrations/react-hook-form) Learn more about [uploading Files to the Cloud (database/API).](/) Learn more about [how file state management works](/file-state-management), useful for more custom integrations/use cases.
